forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
